revised_title: Meteorological Observations for 1769 in Bridgewater, Somersetshire
tldr: This article presents meteorological observations made in Bridgewater, Somersetshire in 1769. It includes data on barometric pressure, weather conditions, wind direction, and temperature. The author, Dr. Jeremiah Milles, provides a detailed breakdown of each month, highlighting the prevailing weather patterns and notable events.
